environment.//description: Define the metadata related to the system, prerequisites, and configurations
environment.//initialConfigList: represents the list of the configurations that need to be loaded first
environment.//loadedConfigProps: list of properties read by the configParser

cmdRunnerProperties.//description: define the properties passed to the CMD runner to be set as env-vars

cliPiggyBackEnvVars.//description: Holds information about the variables that will be attached to the command runner

cliPiggyBackArgs.//description: Holds information about list of arguments that's appended to some SDK commands
